snippet: Cardiff City owner Vincent Tan wants to appoint Leyton Orient boss Russell Slade as manager in the hope he can usher in a new era of stability at the Welsh side and beat Arsene Wenger's long-service record at Arsenal....

headline.print_headline: Cardiff Owner Tan Wants Slade to Outlast Long-Serving Wenger
headline.main: Cardiff Owner Tan Wants Slade to Outlast Long-Serving Wenger

lead_paragraph: Cardiff City owner Vincent Tan wants to appoint Leyton Orient boss Russell Slade as manager in the hope he can usher in a new era of stability at the Welsh side and beat Arsene Wenger's long-service record at Arsenal.
